name: 施勝雄
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
schedule:
第一週(9/14~9/18)：
Ch1 1.1~1.9 Normal Stress, Shearing Stress, Bearing Stress,Simple Structure
第二週(9/21~9/25)：
Ch1 !.1.11~1.13 Stress under Axial and General loading,Components of Stress
第三週(9/28~10/2)：
Ch2 2.1~2.11 Stress-Strain Diagram,Hooke’s law,Poisson’s ratio,Thermal Stress and Strain,Statically Indeterminate Problem.
第四週(10/5~10/9)：
Ch2 2.12~2.20 Shear Strain, Stress Concentration,Saint Venant’s Principle.
第五週(10/12~10/16)：
Ch3 3.1~3.11 Torsion in Shaft,Stress,Angle of Twist,
第六週(10/19~10/23)：
Ch3 3.6~3.8 Statically Indeterminate Problem in Torsion,
Design of Transmission Shaft, Stress Concentration inCircular Shgaft.
第七週(10/26~10/30)：
Ch4 4.1~4.4 Pure bending, Stress and Deformation.
第八週(11/2~11/6)：
Ch4 4.5~4.7 Deformation in a Transverse Cross Section
第九週(11/9~11/13)：期中考
第十週(11/16~11/20)

6.6 ~6.7.Thin-Walled Members
第十二週(11/30~12/4)

7.5 ~7.6 Mohr’s Circle
第十三週(12/6~12/12)
Ch8: 8.1~8.4Principle Stresses in a Beam

Ch9: 9.1~9.3Equations of the Elastic Curves
第十五週(12/21~12/25)
